Hi all quick question I had a dual boot going with windows and ubuntu I have now killed my windows partiton and want to extend my ubuntu partition to take up my whole drive but dont want to loose my current ubuntu load how could I do this
Boot up with the Ubuntu Live-CD and use gparted to extend the size of your Ubuntu parition(s).
Don't merge, just delete the Windows one and extend the Linux one... if thats what you intend to do.
